channel.title: Infrastructure on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Building the virtual Cobbler deployment
item.description: In this scene I’ll discuss how I’ve built out a local Cobbler deployment into my virtual host in order to bootstrap the operating system onto my baremetal nodes via kickstart files and PXE booting.
